changelog.zh:
- 优化：所有频道卡片文字支持滚动显示（不再省略）
- 新增：设置中可控制首页是否显示观看记录和收藏夹
- 优化：首页显示顺序调整（观看记录第一，收藏夹第二）
- 优化：频道卡片、分类卡片、收藏页面文字悬停/聚焦时自动滚动
- 优化：AutoScrollText组件支持外部控制滚动状态
changelog.en:
- Improved: All channel card text now scrolls instead of truncating
- Added: Settings to control watch history and favorites display on home
- Improved: Home page order adjusted (watch history first, favorites second)
- Improved: Channel cards, category cards, favorites page text auto-scroll on hover/focus
- Improved: AutoScrollText component supports external scroll control
